title: *PATREON PREVIEW* Everybody F*cks With Me Pt. II with Guapdad 4000
description:
It’s a check! Throwing Fits is back behind the paywall with the Platinum Prince of Persia himself, Guapdad 4000. Jimmy and Larry are putting everything on the line in the service of real music journalism for a full turbo deep dive into existential nuts, giving Sean Evans his personal space, who’s really answering Guap’s DMs, losing bets against Drake, how fast J. Cole responds to texts, DEF CON level blerd, Denzel Curry’s five-sided fistagon, the secret to throwing a good party, the anatomy of an iconic Grammys fit, getting top in a music video, the merits of car sex, the economic realities of being a rapper, being a Boy Scout when it comes to these hoes and much more on this Patreon-exclusive whap.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
